properties.value: Adamant brutal arrows are used to kill Zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and Adamantite nails (a hammer is also required). Level 62 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 10.2 experience per arrow. They can only be used with a Composite ogre bow.

Item ID4798

Adamant brutal arrows are used to kill Zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and Adamantite nails (a hammer is also required). Level 62 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 10.2 experience per arrow. They can only be used with a Composite ogre bow.

[[File:Adamant brutal detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Adamant brutal arrows''' are used to kill [[Zogre]]s south of the [[Castle Wars]] arena. They are made with [[flighted ogre arrow]]s and [[Adamantite nails]] (a hammer is also required). Level 62 [[Fletching]] is required to make these and they will yield 10.2 [[experience]] per arrow. They can only be used with a [[Composite ogre bow]].
